thread.title: Moto X with 21MP camera now available online at Rs 16,999
thread.title_full: Moto X with 21MP camera now available online at Rs 16,999

title: Moto X with 21MP camera now available online at Rs 16,999
text:
Oct 15, 2015, 08.20 AM | Source: IBNLive.com Moto X with 21MP camera now available online at Rs 16,999 The phone was launched in India only last month at Rs 18,499. However, under the sale the phone is available for Rs 16,999 for the 16 GB model. The 32 GB model is available at Rs 18,499 from the original Rs 19,999.   Moto X with 21MP camera now available online at Rs 16,999 The phone was launched in India only last month at Rs 18,499. However, under the sale the phone is available for Rs 16,999 for the 16 GB model. The 32 GB model is available at Rs 18,499 from the original Rs 19,999.   
O ne of the newest smartphones to be offered on a discount at the ongoing Big Billion Days sale on Flipkart is Motorolaâ€™s Moto X Play that features a 21 megapixel camera. 
The phone was launched in India only last month at Rs 18,499. However, under the sale the phone is available for Rs 16,999 for the 16 GB model. The 32 GB model is available at Rs 18,499 from the original Rs 19,999.The discounted price, however, is the advertised price for app-only purchase and different from the one currently listed on the website.The Moto X Play features a 5.5-inch HD display and under its hood is a 1.7GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 Octa-core processor combined with 2 GB RAM. The phone also offers memory expansion up to 128 GB via microSD card. 
Flipkart is also offering additional exchange offer of up to Rs 8,000 on functional and intact exchange device. You can go through the terms and conditions before making the purchase.
